think that's right.\""},{"lineNumber":149523,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、そうだろそうだろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahaha, see? Right?\""},{"lineNumber":149524,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……ふふ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Hehe.\""},{"lineNumber":149525,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hehe...\""},{"lineNumber":149526,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、あの……私達を元いた場所に","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Um, could you please let us return to where we originally were?"},{"lineNumber":149527,"originalJapaneseLine":"　帰してもらえないでしょうか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can you let us return?\""},{"lineNumber":149528,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うぅん、駄目よ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Nope, that's not possible.\""},{"lineNumber":149529,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方達はまだ洗脳が解けていないの、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You guys haven't had the brainwashing undone yet,"},{"lineNumber":149530,"originalJapaneseLine":"　外に出てはいけないわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"so you must not go outside.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは二人の頭をポカリ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance lightly tapped the two on their heads.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はっ、まさか俺を恨んで化けてここまで……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ha! Could it be that you resent me so much you transformed and came all the way here...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そ、そこまでひどいことしたつもりはないぞ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't think I've done something that bad!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええい、奴隷の幽霊とは生意気な！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey, how cheeky of you slave ghosts!
I'll just go ahead and violate you!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「わ、私達、ちゃんと生きてます！」
「あ、触れるんだからそりゃそうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, well, of course, since you can be touched."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今までどこで何してた！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where have you been and what have you been doing all this time!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ケッセルリンクに捕まって、
あのお城でメイドとして働くようにって……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and told to work as maids in that castle..."
"Did they do something perverted to you!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、されてません、されません！」
「むしろ、とっても親切にされました……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "On the contrary, they were very kind to us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒になることも強要されませんでしたし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They didn't force us to become apostles either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここが安全だからずっと私達といるようにって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that this place is safe and to stay with us all the time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが背中がむずむずとするのを
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance tried to hide the tingling sensation along his back

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誤魔化すように大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: by opening his mouth wide as if to laugh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がはははははははははははははははは！
俺様の方がいい男だからな！
「がははは、そうだろそうだろ！」
「あ、あの……私達を元いた場所に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Um, could you please let us return to where we originally were?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 帰してもらえないでしょうか？」
「貴方達はまだ洗脳が解けていないの、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You guys haven't had the brainwashing undone yet,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 外に出てはいけないわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: so you must not go outside."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
